name: Trexate
description:
A time-travelling twinstick shooter, built for a 12-week university module. Take charge against waves of enemies as you fight your way back in time to save the galaxy!

Controls Keyboard & Mouse
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim, click to shoot
  • ESC to pause
Controller
  • Left stick to move
  • Right stick to shoot
  • START to pause
Team
  • Cinder Foster-Smith: Programmer & Designer
  • Matej Recek: Artist & Designer
  • Nathan Smith: Secretary & Writer
Source Code

all source code is available at https://github.com/cyndrdev/trexate.

Have fun!
